description: 2 x Ash (applicants ref. G1) -Crown lift to 2.5m over footpaths. Crown lift to 4.5m over roads and parking bays. clear street furniture and buildings by 1.5m. to make sure trees are suitable clear of buildings, roads, paths and lighting. Standing in Group G3 of Tree Preservation Order.43 x Willow (applicants ref. G4) -Crown lift to 2.5m over footpaths. Crown lift to 4.5m over roads and parking bays. clear street furniture and buildings by 1.5m. to make sure trees are suitable clear of buildings, roads, paths and lighting. Standing in Group G6 of Tree Preservation Order.1 x Horse Chestnut (applicants ref. T827) - Fell to ground level, poor form and signs of bleeding canker. Standing in Group G1 of Tree Preservation Order.1 x Willow (applicants ref. T812) - Repollard back to existing pruning points to maintain current pruning practice and alleviate weight. Standing in Group G5 of Tree Preservation Order.1 x Horse Chestnut (applicants ref. T839) - Remove the north eastern lateral limb. Reduce limb due to crack through union. Standing in Group G1 of Tree Preservation Order.1 x Willow (applicants ref. T853) - Reduce to approx 3m height retaining lower regrowth. Crown lift to 2.5m over footpath reduce to standing stump due to poor condition. Standing in Group G5 of Tree Preservation Order.1 x Horse Chestnut (applicants ref. T844) - Reduce in height by 4-5m & reduce laterals to balance in order to reduce stress on main stem. Standing in Group G1 of Tree Preservation Order.1 x Horse Chestnut (applicants ref. T845) - Fell to ground level due to poor condition. Standing in Group G1 of Tree Preservation Order.
